title: Oracle (OCI) | IC-2 | Bengaluru | Feb 2024 | Accept
content:
Education: Tier-3 College Years of Experience: 1 year 7 months Prior Experience: SDE-1 at product based company Previous Compensation: 29 LPA CTC Date of the Offer: February 2024 Company: Oracle, OCI Title/Level: IC2 / SDE-2 Location: Bangalore, India Salary: 26,00,000 PF+Gratuity: 1,40,000 Relocation assistance : NA Performance Bonus: NA Joining Bonus: 3,00,000 (1st month) + 3,00,000 (18th month) Stock bonus: 30000 USD (6,22,000 / yr ) Total comp (Salary + Joining Bonus + Stock + Reimbursements) 1st year : 36,62,000/- Benefits: Medical Insurance other standard OCI benefits.

title: Microsoft | SDE2/ L61
content:
Education: Tier 2
Years of Experience: 3 YOE
Current : 22L Base + 20L RSUs + 2L bonus = 44LPA ( company stocks listed )

Date of the Offer: Feb 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: L61
Location: Bangalore
Salary: Base 28 LPA
Signing Bonus: 3+2
Stock bonus: 90K USD (Over 4 years / after 1 year 6.25% vested every 3 months )
Bonus: 0-20 %
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 28 + 18.60 + 3 (taking 10 % as bonus ) + 3 = 52.6 LPA
Benefits: Whatever microsoft offers

I feel its a lowball. What to do ? Is the Microsoft Brand name worth it ?

title: Caizin | FTE | Pune | referral
content:
Education: Tier-1 institute
Years of Experience: 3 years
Prior Experience: 3 years
Date of the Offer: Jan 2024
Company: Caizin
Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer
Location: Pune
Salary: 16 L
Signing Bonus: 3 L
Stock bonus: 10 L, 33% every year for three years
Re-Location Bonus: 2L
Retirals (PF and Gratuity): 3L
Total comp (at the end of one year): 16+3+3.33+3+2 = ~27.3L
Benefits: 15 paid vacation days + 10 paid sick leave days  + 2 paid personal days + free gym membership  + covered health/dental/vision
Other details: Negotiated once, original offer did not have signing bonus. Was given a week to accept or decline the offer.


Thanks leetcode Team

title: Paypal SDE 1 Offer [Accepted]
content:
Compensation Details.

- Education: B.Tech CSE
- Years of Experience: 1
- Date of the Offer: End of Dec 2023
- Company: Paypal
- Title/Level: Software Engineer 1
- Location: WFH
- Salary: 16 LPA (Base)
- Relocation: No relocation
- Signing Bonus: 4 LPA (Full amount with first month pay)
- Stock bonus: $13000, vested over 3 years. 33% in first year, then monthly (33%/12) after first year.
- Bonus: 160000 (80K Cash, 80K stocks) (After year ends)
- First year Comp. (Base Salary + Joinig Bonus + Stock + Year end bonus): 16 LPA + 4 LPA + $4300 (i.e $13000/3) + 1.6L = ~25 L (Note: 1$ i have take 80 Rupee )
- Benefits: General PayPal benifits health insurance, Free Udemy, Oriely, Linkedin Learning etc. ESPP was also an option but i don't have clarity on that so i haven't opted it yet. 

---

Interview Experience
4 rounds (OA + 2 DSA + 1 LLD with Manager). 
DSA question levels were LC medium. LLD was not in very depth, it was mostly around OOPs concept, how will you write class, what CRUD operations will look like etc.

* 21 days of annual paid leaves + 15 days of sick/casual leaves per year

* Internet and car allowances
* Educational courses and medical reimbursements

title: Wayfair vs Servicenow
content:
Current TC : 20 LPA
YOE : 3

Offers :-

Company: Wayfair
Title/Level: Software Engineer (L2)
Location: Bangalore
Base Salary: INR 34 LPA (including PF)
Performance Bonus: None
Stock bonus: None
Total TC per year : 34 LPA
Relocation Bonus : None
Joining Bonus : None
Team: Storefront Org

Company: ServiceNow
Title/Level: Software Engineer (IC2)
Location: Hyderabad
Base Salary: INR 25 LPA (excluding PF and gratuity)
Performance Bonus: 10% of base fixed
Stock bonus: 35000 USD over 4 years
Relocation Bonus : 20000 + Air Tickets
Joining Bonus : None
Compensation per year (adding PF and gratuity + Stocks per year) :- ~ 36.4 LPA
Team :- Data Platform

I am currently in Bangalore and would prefer to stay for personal reasons. 
Does servicenow allow remote work?
What would you choose?
